author: Darkenvy

changelog.release_notes: Added last card to memory. Shows last card on boot to disillusion loading. Shortened change interval from 60 minutes to 10 minutes.
Fixed settings to not require API every time. Simply change settings on the fly. Added 3 modes to display under settings.

description:
NOTE: Must install this Japanese language pack to work! Japanese is not natively supported by Pebble. http://wh.to/pebble/index_jp.html

WaniKani  on your Pebble watch! Immerse yourself not only with the time, but your most difficult words. This app takes a snapshot of your WaniKani profile every hour to provide you with the most  to date vocabulary throughout your . Currently grabs any words under 70% [correct] rating. If your difficult words aren't for you, you can also change it to display recent unlocks or no words at all. Due to popular demand, activity mode is now available; showing only your due queue on WaniKani. See the last snapshot for example.

Tells the time,
Shows your title & Level
Shows Kanji, Hiragana and the definition
Informs you of your current review count available
Updates hourly & changes words upon every change to the screen.
Runs on Javascript


Notes:  If you like the Japanese language pack, show your support to the developer. He performed much more work than I did and without his effort, this watch-face would not have come to fruition.  

The javascript which this is written in runs on your phone. The delay function only works if the app is in the foreground for the entire hour. Working on finding a better solution. For the time being, toggling away and back to the watch-face will update it manually.

title: WaniKani TokeiTokei Legacy
